question.title: QuerySyntaxException: Path expected for join! in HQL query on unrelated table

node.contents: I'm not sure, but it's not possible to JOIN two unrelated entities in HQL using arbitrary properties. CategoryTranslator and MapProxy are not related, ie. there is no reference between them.

astNode.text: I'm not sure, but it's not possible to JOIN two unrelated entities in HQL using arbitrary properties. CategoryTranslator and MapProxy are not related, ie. there is no reference between them.

node.contents: SURE...that was the problem! this is the correct query: `SELECT DISTINCT cat_t.artCat FROM CategoryTranslator cat_t, MapProxy mp WHERE cat_t.provider = mp.connector.provider.name AND mp.service.serviceName=:serviceName AND mp.application.applicationName=:applicationName`

astNode.text: SURE...that was the problem! this is the correct query: `SELECT DISTINCT cat_t.artCat FROM CategoryTranslator cat_t, MapProxy mp WHERE cat_t.provider = mp.connector.provider.name AND mp.service.serviceName=:serviceName AND mp.application.applicationName=:applicationName`

elements.contents: public class MapProxy implements Serializable { private Service service; private Application application; private Connector connector; //getter and setter } public class CategoryTranslator implements Serializable{ private ArtCategory artCat; private ProviderCategory providerCat; private String provider; //gettere and setter }

comments.text: //getter and setter } public class CategoryTranslator implements Serializable{ private ArtCategory artCat; private ProviderCategory providerCat; private String provider; //gettere and setter }

node.contents: I writed a query into ArtCategory xml mapper to have as result an ArtCategory from a serviceName and applicationName

astNode.text: I writed a query into ArtCategory xml mapper to have as result an ArtCategory from a serviceName and applicationName

elements.contents: <query name="ArtCategory.getCategoryByServApp"> SELECT DISTINCT cat_t.artCat FROM CategoryTranslator cat_t INNER JOIN MapProxy mp WITH (cat_t.provider = mp.connector.provider.name) INNER JOIN mp.service ser WITH (ser.serviceName=:serviceName) INNER JOIN mp.application app WITH (app.applicationName=:applicationName) </query>

SELECT DISTINCT cat_t.artCat FROM CategoryTranslator cat_t INNER JOIN MapProxy mp WITH (cat_t.provider = mp.connector.provider.name) INNER JOIN mp.service ser WITH (ser.serviceName=:serviceName) INNER JOIN mp.application app WITH (app.applicationName=:applicationName)

units.rawText: <query name="ArtCategory.getCategoryByServApp"> SELECT DISTINCT cat_t.artCat FROM CategoryTranslator cat_t INNER JOIN MapProxy mp WITH (cat_t.provider = mp.connector.provider.name) INNER JOIN mp.service ser WITH (ser.serviceName=:serviceName) INNER JOIN mp.application app WITH (app.applicationName=:applicationName) </query>

node.contents: When I excecute this query I receve an Hibernate exception:

astNode.text: When I excecute this query I receve an Hibernate exception:

elements.contents: 11:52:55,485 ERROR [PARSER] Invalid path: 'mp.application' 11:52:55,499 ERROR [SessionFactoryImpl] Error in named query: ArtCategory.getCategoryByServApp org.hibernate.hql.ast.QuerySyntaxException: Path expected for join!

units.rawText: 11:52:55,485 ERROR [PARSER] Invalid path: 'mp.application' 11:52:55,499 ERROR [SessionFactoryImpl] Error in named query: ArtCategorygetCategoryByServApp org.hibernate.hql.ast.QuerySyntaxException: Path expected for join!

elements.contents: SELECT DISTINCT cat_t.artCat FROM CategoryTranslator cat_t WHERE cat_t.provider='test'

units.rawText: SELECT DISTINCT cat_tartCat FROM CategoryTranslator cat_t WHERE cat_t.provider='test'

node.contents: In another xml mapper (MaxProxy) I have this query which works well, too

astNode.text: In another xml mapper (MaxProxy) I have this query which works well, too

elements.contents: <query name="MapProxy.getProxy_service_app"> SELECT mp FROM MapProxy mp INNER JOIN mp.service srv WITH (srv.serviceName=:serviceName) INNER JOIN mp.application app WITH (app.applicationName=:applicationName) </query>
SELECT mp FROM MapProxy mp INNER JOIN mp.service srv WITH (srv.serviceName=:serviceName) INNER JOIN mp.application app WITH (app.applicationName=:applicationName)

units.rawText: <query name="MapProxy.getProxy_service_app"> SELECT mp FROM MapProxy mp INNER JOIN mp.service srv WITH (srv.serviceName=:serviceName) INNER JOIN mp.application app WITH (app.applicationName=:applicationName) </query>

node.contents: Why hiberante can't map mp.application? What do I wrong?
